entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Mine Centre
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:47 AM CDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Atikokan 06:00 AM EST Friday 17 March 2023
Temperature: -10.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -12.8°C
Wind: NNE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CDT Friday 17 March 2023
